name: CyberWave
description: CyberWave is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its forest green box, retro console buttons, and hand-down arms and legs, it stands out among its robotic peers. The screen of CyberWave displays a classic game of snake, adding a touch of nostalgia to its appearance. This robot is equipped with advanced technology and is ready to assist its users in analyzing and visualizing electronic waveforms.
